# td

```go
import "github.com/periaate/blume/cmd/td"
```

Package main \- td, time and date parsing DSL.

Example:

```
> td
2024-07-29

> td 1d
2024-07-30

> td -1d
2024-07-28

> td h
17:00

> td d h
2024-07-29 17:00
```

## Index

- [Variables](<#variables>)


## Variables

<a name="M"></a>

```go
var (
    M = 30 * d
)
```
